findByUserNum: SELECT USER_NUM, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_MOBILE FROM TEMP_USER WHERE USER_NUM = :userNum
findAllByUserGender: SELECT USER_NUM, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_MOBILE FROM TEMP_USER WHERE USER_GENDER = :userGender
isMemberExists: SELECT TRUE FROM TEMP_USER WHERE USER_NAME = :userName AND USER_GENDER = :userGender
